Package org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.auctions

Interface Summary
Auctioneer This interface is implemented by the AccessMediator and StorageBroker and provides methods of communication between these and the Auction.
 

Class Summary
AccessMediator The AccessMediator acts as an Auctioneer, creating an Auction thread for the required file.
AnnounceMessage This Message is used to propagate the result of an auction.
Auction Auction threads form a pool of threads and sleep when they are not being used.
AuctionThread Auction threads form a pool of threads which sleep when they are not being used.
AuctionThreadPool The pool of auction threads.
Bid Represents an offer from a particular SB on a particular site.
BidReplyMessage This Message is used to send offers to a requesting Auctioneer.
BidRequestMessage This Message is used to propagate the request for a file.
Debugger Used to print debugging information during the auction process.
Message Class Message has to be extended by all message classes allowing the communication between two P2P Mediators.
P2P Class P2P represents the P2P Mediator, a thread running on each site of the Grid able to "listen" to messages coming from both remote and local sites and to process them.
P2PManager This class manages the P2P network.
PropagatingMessage This Message is used to propagate an arbitrary message to all sites.
ReadyForDownloadMessage This Message is used when a file is ready and is sent to the requesting Auctioneer.
RFDStatusHandler Handles the status of the RFD message - whether we have received it or not.
StorageBroker StorageBroker class is a thread which handles the auctions on behalf of a StorageElement.
